body_content.explanation: a device containing speakers (= devices through which recorded sound is played) that is used underneath a television, computer, etc. in order to improve the quality of the sound:
examples: If you want to improve on the standard sound that comes with your flat-screen TV, a good audio solution comes in the form of either a soundbar or a soundbase.
A sound base is a large, flat box that functions as both a speaker and as a stand for your TV.
